name: Lost life Bound by souls
description:
You are in purgatory, the only way out is to collect souls. You can channel your soul to fire soul shards.

Controlles:

wasd keys = move

left mb = shoot

1, 2, 3 Key = change shards (bullets)

The first shard goes threw eniemies, but is weak. The second shard hits like a truck and the third shard is slow, but explodes. You shard is also your hp, if you have not shard left you die in one hit

Music:

background music was made with an rusty old sheet puncher (I reversed the sound)

and a Piano in Fl studio
